description: The phenomenon where couples or spouses resemble each other in appearance and behavior after spending a lot of time together.

examples.chinese: 两人真的越看越有夫妻相啊
examples.translation: The more I look at those two, the more they look like a husband and wife.

examples.chinese: 因为夫妻相,才长的像的
examples.translation: They look alike because of the 「couple look」 phenomenon.
